Description: Our company started its commercial activities in Ukraine in 2004 as Vent Tek, LLC and then continued as KC engineering, LLC and Global Construction, LLC, while continuing on its way by developing its experience in every field by taking part in many structures such as hotels, airports, shopping malls, business centers, residences, underground subways and towers in this 18-year process. In February 2022 because of war it suspended its activities. In February 2023, along with Raysu, LLC Construction Company in partnership, which has years of experience in the field of oil energy, dam, hydraulic systems, road and bridge in Turkey, it continued its activities by purchasing Yednist construction company
